Text:
Hello torrentlord, can you reseed Masterpiece_Classic_Sharpes_Challenge_720p_20110731_TTL please?

I, and probably others, are at 93% for quite a while.
I answered this quite awhile ago. As this file is almost a year old I am not able  to grant your request as the file was removed several months ago.

Righto, I didn't see the answer when you wrote it, or at least forgot the answer.
@l214l: I may still have this on a back-up BR-disc, but it will take quite a while to look for it . Only so many hours in a day.
@l214l : Seeding your request as of now.

Yes, thanks. Patience has paid off, I have the file now.  I am seeding two others at the moment, and will continue to do so.

Congrats for the green skull.
